jd: Hello Professionals,This Azhar Mohammad from Softcom Systems INC.I have a below Job Opportunity if you have any Consultants Please let me know…!!Job Title: Oracle DBA with Golden Gate ExpLocation Richardson, TX 75082 (Hybrid work model with 3 days from office in a week)Duration: 6 Months Job Description:• Install, configure, and maintain Oracle Golden Gate for real-time data replication across heterogeneous databases.• Hands on 10+ years’ experience on Oracle DBA skills• Experience on MySQL, Cassandra• Experience setting up master-slave replication and configured automatic failover in MySQL to ensure data availability• Managed and monitored Oracle RAC environments, ensuring high availability and performance.• Implement backup and recovery strategies using RMAN and Data Pump.• Experience on Optimized Cassandra data partitioning and replication strategies• Perform database tuning and optimization to achieve zero lag times in Golden Gate processes.• Develop and maintain database documentation, including schemas, procedures, and best practices.• Collaborate with development and operations teams to ensure seamless integration and performance of database systems.• Conduct regular database audits and health checks to ensure optimal performance and security.• Perform data migration and transformation tasks using Data Pump and SQL*Loader.• Develop and implemented disaster recovery plans to ensure data integrity and availability.• Proficient in below tools• Backup & Recovery: RMAN, Data Pump, Export/Import• Performance Tuning: AWR, ASH, SQL Tuning• Tools & Utilities: OEM, Grid Control, SQL*Loader• Unix shell scripting and the ability to automate routine tasks• Certifications preferred: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Architect Professional.
